title: Fellow @ TiHAN, IIT Hyderabad
description: Finished fellowship at TiHAN. Work included previous internship research as a full-time fellow under the TiHAN Project. Led the Data Collection and RADAR team, managed project execution, mentored juniors, and worked on SLAM and navigation frameworks using automotive RADAR.

title: Autonomous Systems Intern @ CognitiCore
description: Completed internship at CognitiCore. Researched and implemented sensor fusion, SLAM, path planning and control algorithms.

title: Intern @ IIT Hyderabad
description: Worked for over a year in the RADAR team of the Data Collection Project. Processed automotive RADAR signals and data, applied algorithms for localization and perception, and co-authored publications.

title: Intern @ NIT Raipur
description: Completed summer internship developing an efficient Devanagari script inputâ€“based P300 speller system using BCI. Focused on EEG signal processing, feature extraction, and data-driven research.

title: Intern @ Vyorius, India
description: Completed internship at Vyorius. Executed robotics projects and applied automation concepts to industrial robots, gaining hands-on experience in system design and workflows.

title: Intern @ Team IshiHara LLC (Japan)
description: Completed internship at Team Ishihara LLC. Selected among the top 5 of 6000 applicants for the Road to Shine Program. Collaborated with CEO Masayuki Sugahara on the Tech Boukou program, bridging engineering education and industry, gaining international exposure.
